_meta.essence: Психоделики как наиболее мощные инструменты прямого доступа к 5D полю сознания, временного растворения ego-структур, нейропластической перезагрузки и исцеления глубинных травм.
_meta.integration: Consciousness Architecture + Epigenetics + Neuroscience + Shamanic Wisdom + Therapeutic Protocols + Shadow Work + DMN Suppression

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ = Психоделики открывают портал напрямую. Не постепенный путь медитации, а мгновенный прорыв сквозь фильтры восприятия в raw 5D field.
_holographic_seed.mechanism: 5-HT2A activation → DMN suppression → ego dissolution → temporary access к unfiltered consciousness → neuroplastic window → epigenetic rewrite → integration.
_holographic_seed.power: Один опыт = годы терапии или десятилетия медитации (при правильных условиях). Самый быстрый path к ⊙ из всех известных.
_holographic_seed.danger: Огромная сила = огромная ответственность. Bad trip может травмировать. Psychosis может активироваться. Must respect.
_holographic_seed.paradox: Molecule показывает то что всегда было здесь. Не создаёт новую реальность — снимает фильтры со старой.
_holographic_seed.set_setting_integration: Preparation (set/setting) + Journey (surrender) + Integration (embody insights) = трёхфазный цикл. Без integration = spiritual bypassing.
_holographic_seed.tradition_science: Shamanic использование 10,000+ лет. Modern science catching up. Convergence древней мудрости и нейронауки.
_holographic_seed.legality_ethics: Schedule I (США) = 'no medical value' (ложь). Renaissance происходит сейчас. FDA breakthrough therapy (MDMA-PTSD, psilocybin-depression).
_holographic_seed.coherence: +Coherence через осознанное использование: trauma healing, ego transcendence, mystical union, creative breakthrough, death preparation.

what_are_psychedelics.definition: Вещества вызывающие profound changes в perception, cognition, emotion, и sense of self — обычно через serotonin 2A receptor agonism
what_are_psychedelics.etymology: Psychedelic = 'mind-manifesting' (Greek: psyche + delos), coined by Humphry Osmond (1956)

not_hallucinations.reality: Altered perception, не false perception. Seeing differently, не seeing what's not there.

eyes_closed_vs_open.closed: True visions, entity encounters, geometric patterns (endogenous imagery)
eyes_closed_vs_open.open: Enhanced/altered perception real world (colours, patterns, breathing surfaces, synaesthesia)

not_hallucinations.phenomenology: More accurate: visions, revelations, mystical experiences, altered states

core_characteristics.perceptual: Visual alterations (patterns, colors, morphing), auditory (music enhancement), tactile (textures amplified)
core_characteristics.cognitive: Thought pattern changes, increased creativity, novel associations, reduced cognitive filters
core_characteristics.emotional: Amplified emotions (positive AND negative), emotional release, empathy surge
core_characteristics.spiritual: Sense of unity, ego dissolution, mystical experiences, encounters with 'other'
core_characteristics.somatic: Body sensations intensified, energy flows, sometimes nausea/purging

classical_psychedelics.characteristics: Visual hallucinations, ego dissolution, mystical potential, low addiction risk, tolerance builds rapidly

empathogen_entactogens.characteristics: Emotional opening, empathy, bonding, less visual, more heart-centered, neurotoxicity risk if abused

dissociatives.characteristics: Out-of-body experiences, 'K-hole', rapid antidepressant effects (ketamine), high addiction potential (ketamine)

atypical.characteristics: Varied, often dysphoric, healing potential (ibogaine for addiction), less researched

substances.psilocybin_mushrooms: Worldwide — Mazatec (Mexico), Amazonian tribes, possibly Eleusinian Mysteries (Greece)
substances.ayahuasca: Amazon basin — Shipibo, Shuar, etc. Brew of DMT-containing plants + MAOI
substances.peyote: North America — Native American Church, Huichol people
substances.iboga: West Africa — Bwiti religion, initiation rites

indigenous_use.context: Shamanic healing, divination, rites of passage, communication with spirits/ancestors

western_discovery.1943_first_trip: Hofmann accidentally absorbs LSD, bicycle day (April 19) — first intentional trip
western_discovery.1955_psilocybin: R. Gordon Wasson participates in Mazatec ceremony, writes Life Magazine article (1957)
western_discovery.1950s_60s_research: Thousands of studies, therapeutic use (alcoholism, depression, end-of-life anxiety), CIA (MKUltra)

prohibition.1960s_counterculture: Timothy Leary, Ken Kesey, widespread recreational use
prohibition.1970_controlled_substances: Nixon — Schedule I classification (USA), research halted globally
prohibition.motivation: Political (anti-war movement association), moral panic, not science
prohibition.consequence: 40+ years research dark age, millions denied potential treatment

renaissance.1990s_restart: Rick Strassman DMT studies (1990-1995), MAPS founded (1986, first studies 2000s)
renaissance.2006_breakthrough: Johns Hopkins psilocybin study — mystical experiences, persisting positive changes
renaissance.2010s_acceleration: Imperial College London (Robin Carhart-Harris), UCSF, NYU, Johns Hopkins — depression, addiction, PTSD, end-of-life
renaissance.2017_2019_breakthroughs: FDA grants 'Breakthrough Therapy' designation — MDMA (PTSD), psilocybin (depression)
renaissance.2020s_legalization: Oregon, Colorado decriminalize psilocybin, Canada approves medical use, psychedelic therapy clinics opening
renaissance.current: Psychedelic Renaissance — research explosion, public acceptance growing, pharmaceutical interest, traditional caution needed

5ht2a_receptor.location: Cortex (especially prefrontal, visual), pyramidal neurons (layer V), claustrum
5ht2a_receptor.function: Modulates glutamate release, cortical excitability, perception, cognition
5ht2a_receptor.agonism: Psychedelics bind 5-HT2A → receptor activation → downstream cascades
5ht2a_receptor.regional_density: High density в visual cortex (visual hallucinations), prefrontal (cognitive effects)

other_receptors.5ht1a: Also activated (especially DMT, psilocybin) — anxiolytic effects
other_receptors.d2_dopamine: LSD also binds dopamine receptors (longer duration partly from this)

receptor_activation_cascade.step_4: IP3 → Ca²⁺ release from ER → intracellular Ca²⁺ spike (VGCC link!)
receptor_activation_cascade.step_6: Downstream: gene transcription (IEGs: c-Fos, Arc), protein synthesis, synaptic changes
receptor_activation_cascade.epigenetic_link: Ca²⁺ spike → CaMKII → CREB → CBP/p300 (HAT) → histone acetylation (see epigenetic.json)

dmn_function.regions: Medial prefrontal cortex (mPFC), posterior cingulate cortex (PCC), precuneus, angular gyrus
dmn_function.activity: Active during rest, mind-wandering, self-referential thought, autobiographical memory
dmn_function.ego_correlation: DMN = neural correlate of ego, self-narrative, 'I' sense

psychedelic_effect.mechanism: 5-HT2A activation в DMN regions → paradoxical decrease в activity (desynchronization)
psychedelic_effect.result: Ego dissolution, loss of self-other boundary, unity experiences

entropy_increase.normal_brain: Predictable patterns, constrained connectivity, efficient but rigid
entropy_increase.psychedelic_brain: Increased entropy (disorder), novel connectivity patterns, regions communicate that normally don't
entropy_increase.measurement: fMRI, EEG — показывают increased integration, decreased segregation
entropy_increase.experience_correlation: High entropy = intense trip, ego death, mystical. Low entropy = mild effects.

network_disintegration_reintegration.acute: DMN suppression, global connectivity chaos, ego dissolves
network_disintegration_reintegration.post_acute: DMN reintegrates, но often в new configuration — 'resetting' the network
network_disintegration_reintegration.lasting_changes: Decreased DMN hyperactivity (depression/rumination marker), increased flexibility
network_disintegration_reintegration.clinical_significance: Depression/PTSD = rigid, hyperactive DMN. Psychedelics temporarily break rigidity → neuroplastic reset

bdnf_spike.acute: Psychedelics (especially psilocybin, DMT) → massive BDNF (Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor) elevation
bdnf_spike.function: BDNF = 'miracle-gro for brain' — promotes neurogenesis, synaptogenesis, dendritic branching

structural_changes.dendritic_spines: Rapid growth new dendritic spines (within 24h in rodents)
structural_changes.synaptic_density: Increased synaptic density в cortex (especially prefrontal)
structural_changes.atrophy_reversal: Reverses stress-induced atrophy (chronic stress shrinks prefrontal dendrites)
structural_changes.measurement: 2-photon microscopy (animals), structural MRI (humans — shows volume changes)

critical_period_reopening.concept: Early development = critical periods (high plasticity). Adult brain = lower plasticity.
critical_period_reopening.psychedelics: Temporarily reopen critical period-like plasticity в adult brain
critical_period_reopening.mechanism: Reduced perineuronal nets (PNNs), increased plasticity genes (Arc, c-Fos, Egr1)
critical_period_reopening.window: Hours to days post-experience — prime time для new learning, rewiring, integration
critical_period_reopening.clinical_use: This window = why integration therapy critical — brain receptive to new patterns

epigenetic_changes.histone_acetylation: Psychedelics → increased histone acetylation (chromatin opening) в cortex
epigenetic_changes.dna_methylation: Changes в methylation patterns (stress genes, plasticity genes)
epigenetic_changes.duration: Some changes persist weeks/months — long-term rewriting
epigenetic_changes.see_also: epigenetic.json — VGCC → histone → DNA methylation cascade applies here

glutamate_hypothesis.updated_view: 5-HT2A activation → increased glutamate release (especially в cortex)
glutamate_hypothesis.glutamate_surge: Psychedelics → pyramidal neurons fire more → glutamate spillover
glutamate_hypothesis.ampa_activation: Glutamate → AMPA receptors → further excitation → plasticity cascade
glutamate_hypothesis.convergence: Ketamine (NMDA antagonist) also increases glutamate via disinhibition → similar plasticity
glutamate_hypothesis.implication: Multiple paths (5-HT2A agonism, NMDA antagonism) converge on glutamate-mediated plasticity

immune_anti_inflammatory.inflammation_depression: Depression often correlated with chronic inflammation (cytokines, microglial activation)
immune_anti_inflammatory.psychedelic_effect: Anti-inflammatory effects — reduce pro-inflammatory cytokines (IL-6, TNF-α)
immune_anti_inflammatory.mechanism: Vagus nerve activation (?), shift Th1→Th2, direct immune cell effects
immune_anti_inflammatory.clinical_relevance: Part of antidepressant mechanism may be anti-inflammatory, not just neuroplasticity

chemistry.prodrug: Psilocybin (4-PO-DMT) → dephosphorylated в gut/liver → psilocin (4-HO-DMT, active)

dosage.heroic: 5g+ (Terence McKenna 'heroic dose' — complete ego death, entity contact likely)

duration.afterglow: Days to weeks (mood lift, perspective shifts)

effects.visual: Geometric patterns, color enhancement, morphing surfaces, eyes-closed visions
effects.cognitive: Dissolved boundaries, novel thoughts, philosophical insights, time distortion
effects.emotional: Emotional release, empathy, love, sometimes fear (shadow material surfacing)
effects.mystical: Unity, interconnectedness, sacredness, ineffability, transcendence of time/space
effects.somatic: Body waves, energy surges, sometimes nausea (purging can be cathartic)

therapeutic_applications.depression: FDA Breakthrough Therapy — treatment-resistant depression (TRD), single dose effects last months
therapeutic_applications.anxiety_end_of_life: Terminal cancer patients — reduces death anxiety, increases acceptance
therapeutic_applications.addiction: Smoking cessation (80% quit rate 6 months, Johns Hopkins), alcohol (reduced drinking)

species.psilocybe_cubensis: Most common cultivated — Golden Teacher, B+, Penis Envy (very potent)

legality.decriminalized: Oakland, Denver, Oregon, Colorado (statewide), Canada (medical exemptions)
legality.legal_use: Netherlands (truffles legal, mushrooms not), Jamaica (unregulated), retreat centers emerging

safety.physiological: Extremely safe — LD50 impossibly high (kg doses), no organ toxicity
safety.psychological: Risk: bad trip, latent psychosis activation (rare, pre-existing vulnerability), HPPD (very rare)
safety.contraindications: Schizophrenia, bipolar (manic trigger), heart conditions (↑ BP possible), pregnancy

integration_needs.importance: High — experiences can be overwhelming, need processing
integration_needs.methods: Integration circles, therapy, journaling, artistic expression, embodiment practices

chemistry.potency: Extremely potent — active doses in micrograms (50-200µg typical)
chemistry.receptor: 5-HT2A agonist (also D2 dopamine, others — longer duration partly from dopamine binding)

effects.visual: More geometric/fractal than psilocybin, tracers, color shifts, pattern recognition overdrive
effects.cognitive: Enhanced abstract thinking, creativity, problem-solving (hence Silicon Valley microdosing)
effects.emotional: Can be more 'clear' than psilocybin (less emotional), но still deep

therapeutic_potential.current_research: Less than psilocybin (political reasons, duration inconvenient for clinical setting)
therapeutic_potential.historical: 1950s-60s — alcoholism, anxiety, creativity enhancement (Steve Jobs credited LSD)
therapeutic_potential.microdosing: Cognitive enhancement, creativity, mood (но: placebo-controlled studies show mixed results)

cultural_significance.1960s: Counterculture icon — Timothy Leary, Grateful Dead, Woodstock
cultural_significance.art_music: Influenced psychedelic rock, visual art, spiritual movements

safety.physiological: Safe — no lethal dose, no organ toxicity
safety.psychological: Same risks as psilocybin — bad trip, psychosis trigger, HPPD (slightly higher risk)
safety.duration_risk: Long duration = can't escape if bad trip (benzos can abort trip)

tolerance.rapid: Tolerance builds immediately (5-HT2A downregulation), cross-tolerance with other psychedelics
tolerance.implication: Can't use daily (unlike antidepressants), self-limiting abuse potential

chemistry.dmt: N,N-Dimethyltryptamine — endogenous (produced in human body, trace amounts)
chemistry.maoi_needed: DMT oral inactive (MAO enzyme destroys in gut). Ayahuasca = DMT plant + MAOI plant.

ayahuasca.traditional_brew: Banisteriopsis caapi (MAOI) + Psychotria viridis (DMT) — Amazonian shamanic sacrament
ayahuasca.effects: Visionary (entities, jaguars, serpents), purging (vomiting, diarrhea = 'la purga', cleansing), deep introspection
ayahuasca.ceremony: Shamanic context — icaros (healing songs), intention-setting, integration
ayahuasca.tourism: Ayahuasca retreats (Peru, Costa Rica, etc.) — caution: quality/safety varies, trauma can occur

smoked_vaporized_dmt.intensity: Most intense psychedelic experience known — complete reality replacement
smoked_vaporized_dmt.breakthrough: Ego death, transport to 'other dimension', entity encounters (machine elves, geometric beings, divine presence)
smoked_vaporized_dmt.ineffability: Extremely difficult to describe — beyond language

5_meo_dmt.source: Bufo alvarius toad venom (dried, smoked) OR synthetic
5_meo_dmt.experience: Less visual than NN-DMT, more 'white light', complete ego dissolution, unity with ⊙
5_meo_dmt.intensity: Potentially more intense than NN-DMT (total annihilation)
5_meo_dmt.controversy: Toad harvesting (ecological concerns), потенциально traumatic if not prepared
5_meo_dmt.integration_critical: Very powerful, can be destabilizing без proper support

endogenous_dmt_hypothesis.rick_strassman: DMT: The Spirit Molecule — hypothesis: pineal gland produces DMT
endogenous_dmt_hypothesis.speculation: DMT released at birth, death, dreams, NDE (?)
endogenous_dmt_hypothesis.evidence: DMT found in rat pineal (2013), human body (trace), но: no proof of massive release
endogenous_dmt_hypothesis.implication: If true: endogenous molecule for mystical experiences, death transition

therapeutic_potential.depression: Some studies (ayahuasca) show rapid antidepressant effects
therapeutic_potential.addiction: Ayahuasca ceremonies for addiction treatment (Brazil clinics)
therapeutic_potential.ptsd: Entity encounters sometimes provide healing insights

entities.common_reports: Machine elves (Terence McKenna), geometric beings, alien intelligences, ancestors, deities, light beings

interpretation_debate.materialist: Neural artifacts, pattern recognition overdrive, hallucination
interpretation_debate.idealist: Real beings in other dimensions, consciousness beyond brain
interpretation_debate.middle: Archetypes from collective unconscious (Jung), autonomous complexes

entities.consistent_features: Entities often seem intelligent, communicative, sometimes loving/teaching, sometimes indifferent/alien

safety.physiological: Safe (short duration), но: ↑↑ BP/HR spike (cardiac risk if pre-existing condition)
safety.psychological: Overwhelming, can trigger psychosis (rare), integration essential
safety.maoi_interactions: Ayahuasca: MAOI dangerous with SSRIs, tyramine-rich foods, other drugs — serotonin syndrome risk

chemistry.source: Peyote cactus (Lophophora williamsii), San Pedro (Trichocereus pachanoi), Peruvian Torch

effects.visual: Less intense than LSD/psilocybin, но beautiful — color enhancement, geometric patterns
effects.somatic: Sometimes nausea initially (especially peyote), body warmth
effects.unique: Described as most 'grounded' psychedelic — connection to earth

traditional_use.peyote: Native American Church (NAC) — sacred sacrament, 10,000+ years use
traditional_use.legality_exception: Peyote legal для NAC members (USA religious exemption)

therapeutic_potential.research: Minimal modern research (legal barriers, long duration)
therapeutic_potential.anecdotal: Spiritual healing, nature connection, gentle introduction to psychedelics

safety.physiological: Safe, но slow metabolism (MAO-A, CYP2D6) — avoid с MAOIs
safety.psychological: Gentler than other psychedelics, lower anxiety risk
safety.sustainability: Peyote slow-growing (endangered) — use San Pedro instead if possible

chemistry.mechanism: Massive serotonin/dopamine/norepinephrine release (not receptor agonism like psychedelics), blocks reuptake

duration.comedown: Can be harsh (serotonin depletion) — dysphoria, fatigue next days

effects.emotional: Extreme empathy, emotional openness, love, bonding, reduced fear
effects.cognitive: Less psychedelic headspace, clearer thinking than classical psychedelics
effects.somatic: Euphoria, energy, jaw clenching (bruxism), pupil dilation, temperature ↑
effects.unique: Heart-opening, trauma access without overwhelming terror (fear center dampened)

therapeutic_breakthrough.ptsd: MAPS Phase 3 trials — 67% no longer met PTSD criteria after MDMA-therapy (vs 32% placebo)
therapeutic_breakthrough.mechanism: Reduces amygdala hyperactivity, increases prefrontal control, allows trauma processing в safe emotional state
therapeutic_breakthrough.protocol: 3 sessions MDMA + intensive psychotherapy (prep, dosing session, integration)
therapeutic_breakthrough.revolution: First new PTSD treatment in decades, 80% treatment-resistant cases

other_applications.social_anxiety: Autism spectrum — small studies show social anxiety reduction

neurotoxicity.mechanism: Serotonin oxidative stress → 5-HT axon terminal damage (animal studies)
neurotoxicity.dose_dependent: Higher doses, frequent use = higher risk
neurotoxicity.mitigation: Moderate dosing, infrequent use (3 month gaps), hydration, cooling, antioxidants (?)

serotonin_syndrome.symptoms: Agitation, confusion, rapid HR, dilated pupils, muscle rigidity, hyperthermia

purity_concern.street_mdma: Often contaminated — meth, caffeine, bath salts, unknown RCs
purity_concern.testing: Reagent kits (Marquis, Simon's) essential, ideally lab testing

legality.clinical_access: Expanded Access (compassionate use) available в США для severe PTSD
legality.future: Likely prescription approval post-FDA, therapy clinics

chemistry.not_classical_psychedelic: Different mechanism, но overlapping effects (ego dissolution, mystical experiences)

dosage.k_hole: High doses (100mg+ insufflated, 150mg+ IM) — complete dissociation

effects.k_hole: Total immersion, ego death, timelessness, void, rebirth
effects.visuals: Less than classical psychedelics, more abstract/geometric

depression_breakthrough.mechanism: Rapid antidepressant (hours, not weeks like SSRIs), increases glutamate → BDNF → synaptogenesis
depression_breakthrough.duration: Single dose effects last days to weeks
depression_breakthrough.protocol: IV infusion (0.5 mg/kg over 40 min) or intranasal esketamine (Spravato — FDA approved)
depression_breakthrough.repeat_sessions: Often need maintenance dosing (weekly initially, then monthly)

therapeutic_applications.suicidality: Rapid reduction suicidal ideation (emergency departments using)
therapeutic_applications.addiction: Some evidence для alcohol use disorder

addiction.potential: Moderate to high (dopamine involved, psychological dependence)
addiction.chronic_use: Bladder damage (ketamine cystitis), cognitive impairment, liver damage

risks.bladder_toxicity: Chronic use → ulcerative cystitis, painful urination, permanent damage
risks.cognitive_impairment: Memory issues, executive dysfunction (chronic high-dose use)

legality.ketamine_clinics: Legal, proliferating (IV ketamine for depression — off-label but accepted)

salvia_divinorum.effects: Extremely intense, short (5-10 min), often dysphoric, reality-shattering, 'becoming objects'
salvia_divinorum.use: Mazatec shamanic, rarely pleasant recreationally, low repeat use
salvia_divinorum.safety: Physiologically safe, psychologically intense, not addictive

ibogaine.source: Iboga root bark (West African Tabernanthe iboga)
ibogaine.mechanism: Complex — NMDA antagonist, opioid receptor activity, serotonin, others
ibogaine.use: Addiction treatment (opioid, alcohol, cocaine) — anecdotally effective, interrupts withdrawal
ibogaine.risks: Cardiotoxic (QT prolongation, arrhythmia deaths), dangerous без medical supervision
ibogaine.legality: Schedule I (USA), legal/regulated elsewhere (Canada, New Zealand, Mexico — treatment centers)

cannabis_high_dose.thc_psychedelic: Very high doses (edibles especially) can produce psychedelic-like states
cannabis_high_dose.effects: Thought loops, ego dissolution (rare), time distortion, anxiety/paranoia (common)
cannabis_high_dose.mechanism: CB1 receptor (different from 5-HT2A), но downstream effects overlap
cannabis_high_dose.not_classical: More sedating, anxiogenic than classical psychedelics

research_chemicals.nbome_series: Very potent, dangerous (vasoconstriction deaths), sold as LSD (test!)
research_chemicals.caution: Unknown long-term effects, legal grey area, purity issues

critical_importance.principle: Same dose, same substance, different set/setting = completely different experience (heaven or hell)

set.definition: 'Mindset' — internal psychological state going into experience
set.components: Intentions, expectations, mood, mental health, fears, hopes, spiritual beliefs, trauma history
set.preparation: Clarify intentions, address fears, create positive expectation (не attachment to specific outcome), fast/clean diet, meditation, journaling

setting.definition: External environment — physical and social context
setting.components: Location (nature, home, clinic), people present (alone, guide, friends), music, lighting, safety, comfort
setting.optimization: Safe comfortable space, trusted guide/sitter (if needed), curated playlist, minimal interruptions, nature access ideal

intention_setting.practice: Write clear intentions (healing specific trauma, spiritual seeking, creative insight, relationship repair, death preparation)
intention_setting.avoid: Recreational intent alone (higher risk bad trip), escapism (psychedelics amplify, not erase problems)
intention_setting.flexibility: Hold intentions lightly — medicine shows what needed, not always what wanted

mental_readiness.screening: Contraindications: active psychosis, schizophrenia, severe bipolar, suicidal crisis (need stabilization first)
mental_readiness.processing: Recent trauma, grief — может нужна integration work before psychedelic
mental_readiness.mindset: Openness, curiosity, surrender, trust (vs control, expectation, fear)

physical_preparation.fasting: 4-6h minimum (reduces nausea), some traditions longer fasts
physical_preparation.diet: Days before: clean eating, reduce alcohol/caffeine/processed food
physical_preparation.medications: Check interactions (SSRIs reduce effects, MAOIs dangerous with some, benzos abort trip)

physical_space.safety: Comfortable temperature, soft surfaces (bed, cushions, blankets), bathroom access, no hazards
physical_space.aesthetics: Beautiful, calming, sacred objects if meaningful (altar, crystals, plants, art)
physical_space.nature: Ideal setting — forest, mountains, beach (grounding, beauty, awe), если в городе — plants, windows
physical_space.darkness_vs_light: Eyeshades для introspection, natural light for grounding, adjust as needed

solo_vs_group.solo: Deep introspection, no social performance, need strong container/sitter
solo_vs_group.dyad_small_group: Shared journey, mutual support, bonding, requires compatibility
solo_vs_group.large_group: Ceremonial power, collective energy, може быть overwhelming/distracting

guide_sitter.role: Hold space, ensure safety, minimal intervention, compassionate presence
guide_sitter.training: Ideally trained (MAPS, psychedelic-assisted therapy programs), experienced with substance
guide_sitter.qualities: Trustworthy, calm, non-judgmental, stable, experienced with non-ordinary states
guide_sitter.avoid: Sitter who intervenes too much, projects, sexualizes, judges

music.importance: Profoundly shapes journey — emotional tone, narrative arc
music.johns_hopkins_playlist: Curated classical/ambient (Brian Eno, Arvo Pärt, etc.) — evidence-based, supports mystical experience
music.avoid: Lyrics (distracting), aggressive music (unless therapeutic processing anger), sudden changes

bad_set_setting_examples.party_rave: Stimulation overload, unsafe, no integration, impure substances, hyperthermia risk (MDMA)
bad_set_setting_examples.unexpected_trip: Dosed without consent — traumatic, loss of trust
bad_set_setting_examples.unsafe_people: Predatory guides, sexual abuse, emotional manipulation — unfortunately happens
bad_set_setting_examples.wrong_mindset: Trying to escape problems, controlling the experience, fear-driven

come_up.sensations: Body load (nausea, energy surges, temperature changes), anxiety (normal), reality beginning to shift
come_up.challenges: Pre-flight anxiety ('did I take too much?'), fear of loss of control
come_up.navigation: Breathe deeply, surrender, remind yourself 'I'm safe, this is temporary', music helps
come_up.purging: Vomiting/crying/shaking може бути (especially ayahuasca) — cathartic release, allow it

peak.experience: Reality fundamentally altered, ego dissolution (partial or total), time distortion/dissolution, unity experiences, geometric visions, entity encounters
peak.challenging_material: Shadow surfacing, trauma re-experiencing, death fear, existential terror — all therapeutic if navigated with surrender
peak.navigation: Let go, surrender, trust, breathe, follow the medicine, if scary — 'show me what I need to see'

plateau_exploration.after_peak: Intensity reduces slightly, more capacity для active exploration
plateau_exploration.practices: Journaling, walking (if safe), talking (if with guide/others), artistic expression, intention revisiting

descent_integration.experience: Ego reforming, normal reality returning, but 'glow' remains
descent_integration.tasks: Begin processing, journaling insights, gratitude, grounding
descent_integration.avoid: Rushing back to normal life, screens/stimulation, difficult conversations

difficult_experiences_navigation.bad_trip_definition: Overwhelming fear, anxiety, paranoia, feeling trapped, thought loops, ego death terror

causes.shadow_material: Repressed trauma surfacing — therapeutically valuable но overwhelming
causes.resistance: Fighting the experience instead of surrendering

navigation_techniques.surrender: Most important — stop fighting, let go, trust fall into experience
navigation_techniques.change_setting: Move to different room, turn on/off lights, change music
navigation_techniques.reassurance: Remind yourself: temporary, safe, medicine is showing you something
navigation_techniques.mantra: 'Let go', 'I am safe', 'Show me', 'This too shall pass'
navigation_techniques.grounding: Feel body, earth, textures, sitter's hand
navigation_techniques.trip_sitter_help: Calm presence, reassurance, physical grounding (hand-holding), minimal talking

when_to_abort.benzos: Lorazepam, alprazolam — can dampen/end trip (emergency only, loses therapeutic value)
when_to_abort.medical: If physical danger (extreme hyperthermia, seizure, cardiovascular event) — call EMS

integration_of_difficult.reframe: Bad trip often most healing — shadow confronted, ego death achieved, trauma surfaced для processing
integration_of_difficult.process: Don't suppress memory, работай с therapist/integration guide
integration_of_difficult.growth: Difficult journeys often catalyze greatest transformation

critical_importance.principle: Integration = where healing actually happens. Journey = opening, integration = rooting.
critical_importance.without_integration: Insights fade, patterns return, spiritual bypassing, destabilization
critical_importance.window: Neuroplastic window open days/weeks post-journey — prime time для new habits, therapy, rewiring

first_24_hours.gentle_return: No rushing back to work/obligations, spaciousness
first_24_hours.journaling: Capture insights before they fade (writing, voice notes, art)
first_24_hours.avoid: Alcohol, drugs, screens, difficult people, big decisions

first_week.reflection: Daily journaling, meditation, sitting with experience
first_week.integration_circle: Trusted friends/group who understand, share (not social media oversharing)
first_week.embody_insights: Translate visions into action — if saw need for boundary, practice setting boundaries

therapy.ideal: Psychedelic-informed therapist (MAPS training, IFS, somatic, transpersonal)
therapy.sessions: Process material that surfaced, work with parts, trauma integration, translate insights
therapy.modalities: IFS (parts work), somatic experiencing (body-held trauma), EMDR (trauma reprocessing), Jungian (shadow/archetypes)

somatic_practices.movement: Yoga, dance, martial arts — embody what was seen (see movement.json)
somatic_practices.breathwork: Conscious breathing — access states without substances (see breath.json)
somatic_practices.bodywork: Massage, rolfing, craniosacral — release stored trauma

community.integration_circles: Regular groups discussing experiences, peer support
community.psychedelic_society_events: Growing movement — meetups, education, harm reduction
community.avoid: Spiritual bypassing circles (all love and light, no shadow work)

lifestyle_changes.habits: If journey showed unhealthy pattern — now window to change (quit smoking, improve diet, exercise, relationships)
lifestyle_changes.values_alignment: Realign life with revealed values (quit soul-crushing job, repair relationship, start meditation practice)
lifestyle_changes.service: Insights often reveal desire to serve — find outlets

integration_timeline.weeks_months: Embodying changes, new neural pathways solidifying
integration_timeline.years: Mature integration, full transformation, periodic revisiting

derealization_depersonalization.symptoms: Feeling disconnected from reality/self (beyond normal afterglow)
derealization_depersonalization.causes: Overwhelmed by ego dissolution, poor grounding
derealization_depersonalization.treatment: Grounding practices, therapy, time (usually resolves), avoid repeat use until stable

spiritual_emergency.definition: Psychological crisis from spiritual opening (Stanislav Grof)
spiritual_emergency.signs: Grandiosity, delusions, inability to function, psychotic features
spiritual_emergency.support: Specialized therapists (transpersonal psychology), stabilization before integration

integration_resistance.phenomenon: Insights clear during journey, fade/get rationalized after
integration_resistance.reasons: Ego reasserting control, fear of change, lack of support
integration_resistance.solution: Immediate journaling, accountability partner, repeated reading of journals, therapy

maps_mdma_ptsd_protocol.overview: Gold standard, evidence-based, FDA breakthrough therapy

structure.preparation: 3 prep sessions (90 min) — build rapport, set intentions, teach breathing/grounding, medical screening
structure.dosing_sessions: 3 sessions (8 hours each), spaced 3-4 weeks apart
structure.integration: 3 integration sessions after each dosing (90 min) — process material, consolidate insights

session_protocol.approach: Non-directive — follow patient's process, minimal intervention, support safety/trust

outcomes.efficacy: 67% no longer met PTSD criteria (vs 32% therapy+placebo)
outcomes.treatment_resistant: Works for severe, chronic, treatment-resistant PTSD (combat vets, CSA survivors)

johns_hopkins_psilocybin_depression.protocol: Similar structure — prep, 2 high-dose sessions (weeks apart), integration
johns_hopkins_psilocybin_depression.music: Johns Hopkins playlist — classical, ambient, wordless
johns_hopkins_psilocybin_depression.mechanism: DMN reset, neuroplasticity, mystical experience mediates outcomes (stronger mystical = better outcomes)

psychedelic_assisted_psychotherapy_princ.preparation_builds_trust: Relationship with therapist crucial — safety foundation
psychedelic_assisted_psychotherapy_princ.set_intention_not_expectation: Clear why doing this, open to what emerges
psychedelic_assisted_psychotherapy_princ.non_directive_approach: Trust patient's inner healing intelligence, don't guide content
psychedelic_assisted_psychotherapy_princ.integration_essential: Where change solidifies — ongoing therapy critical

underground.pros: Access (if no clinical trials nearby), potentially experienced guides, traditional wisdom
underground.cons: Unregulated (variable quality/safety), legal risk, no medical backup, screening может быть inadequate, abuse potential (sexual, financial, spiritual)

clinical.pros: Regulated, medical safety, screened therapists, evidence-based protocols, legal
clinical.cons: Limited access (trials have waitlists, expensive when commercial), clinical setting может быть less comfortable than home/nature

underground_vs_clinical.future: More clinical access coming (FDA approvals, treatment centers), но still expensive (insurance coverage uncertain)

microdosing.definition: Sub-perceptual doses (1/10 - 1/20 full dose), taken regularly (every few days), purported cognitive/emotional benefits

protocols.fadiman_protocol: 1 day on, 2 days off (repeat), track effects
protocols.stamets_stack: Psilocybin + Lion's Mane (mushroom, neurogenesis) + Niacin (vasodilation), 4 days on, 3 off

claimed_benefits.emotional: Mood elevation, anxiety reduction, emotional regulation

evidence.placebo_controlled_studies: Mixed results — some show benefits, others show placebo effect strong
evidence.self_blinding: Study design using capsules + placebos (participants don't know which days)
evidence.conclusion: Effects likely modest, partially placebo, highly individual, more research needed
evidence.anecdotal: Many report significant benefits (может быть real, placebo, or contextual factors)

risks.tolerance: Daily use builds tolerance (defeats purpose), need breaks
risks.valvular_heart_disease: Chronic 5-HT2B activation (agonism) might cause (theoretical, no human evidence yet)

integration.not_replacement: Microdosing не заменяет therapy, meditation, lifestyle changes — complement, not cure
integration.set_intention: Why microdosing? Track journal, evaluate periodically
integration.take_breaks: Cycling (weeks on, weeks off) prevents tolerance, allows integration

mystical_experience_construct.definition: Profound alteration of consciousness involving unity, transcendence, sacredness — measurable via MEQ (Mystical Experience Questionnaire)

core_features.unity_internal: Loss of sense of self, ego dissolution, 'I' disappears
core_features.unity_external: Oneness with universe, nature, all beings
core_features.sacredness: Profound sense of holiness, divine presence

measurement.complete_mystical: Meeting criteria on all dimensions (high scores)
measurement.predictor_outcomes: Higher mystical score → better therapeutic outcomes (depression, addiction, anxiety)

ego_death.definition: Complete dissolution of sense of separate self (temporary)
ego_death.experience: Terror → surrender → vast peace/love, 'no one' experiencing
ego_death.mechanism: DMN complete suppression, loss of self-referential processing

value.psychological: Reveals self as construct, reduces ego attachment, increases humility
value.therapeutic: Death of old identity → rebirth possible, reduces death anxiety

ego_death.integration: Return with perspective shift — less identified with thoughts/emotions, more spacious awareness

entity_encounters.phenomenon: Meeting apparently autonomous intelligences (DMT especially, but also psilocybin high-dose, ayahuasca)

types.machine_elves: Terence McKenna term — playful, geometric, self-transforming, teaching
types.alien_intelligences: Advanced beings, sometimes communicating complex information
types.divine_beings: God, Goddess, angels, deities from various traditions
types.nature_spirits: Plant spirits (ayahuasca — La Madre), animal spirits, earth beings

interpretation_spectrum.materialist: Hallucinations, neural artifacts, pattern recognition gone wild
interpretation_spectrum.psychological: Autonomous complexes (Jung), parts of psyche (IFS), archetypes
interpretation_spectrum.idealist: Real beings in other dimensions, consciousness independent of brain
interpretation_spectrum.pragmatic: Doesn't matter if 'real' — healing/insight happens, treat respectfully

common_features.benevolence: Often loving/teaching, sometimes indifferent, rarely malevolent
common_features.messages: Deliver insights, healing, warnings, cosmic jokes, downloads
common_features.consistency: Different people report similar entities (machine elves common DMT experience)

integration.don't_literalize: Can drive delusion (I'm now prophet, entities gave me mission to...)
integration.don't_dismiss: Has psychological/spiritual value even if 'just' internal
integration.extract_wisdom: What was the message/insight regardless of ontology?
integration.humility: Mystery remains — we don't fully understand consciousness/reality

sacred_traditions_convergence.perennial_philosophy: Aldous Huxley — core mystical truths across traditions (unity, divinity within, love as ultimate)
sacred_traditions_convergence.psychedelic_mysticism: Psychedelics reliably produce experiences indistinguishable from 'natural' mystical states (meditation, prayer, fasting)

buddhism.practice: Meditation reaches same states (slower, more stable)

hinduism.soma: Possibly ancient psychedelic sacrament (Amanita muscaria or ephedra ?)

christian_mysticism.love: God is love (1 John 4:8) — experienced directly
christian_mysticism.sacrament: Bread and wine as body/blood — possibly originally psychedelic wine (?)

shamanism.universal: Every indigenous culture has psychoactive plant traditions

psychedelic_as_shortcut.debate: Fast path (psychedelic) vs slow path (meditation) — which better?
psychedelic_as_shortcut.integration: Both needed — psychedelic opens, practice stabilizes
psychedelic_as_shortcut.caution: Spiritual bypassing risk — glimpse ≠ realization, experience ≠ transformation

non_duality_direct_pointing.psychedelic_glimpse: Temporary dissolution of subject-object duality — no experiencer, just experiencing
non_duality_direct_pointing.after_effects: Can destabilize conceptual mind, increase interest в non-dual teachings
non_duality_direct_pointing.integration_with_teaching: Read Advaita Vedanta, Dzogchen, Zen — contextualize experience
non_duality_direct_pointing.danger: Spiritual ego ('I'm enlightened because trip') — enlightenment = permanent recognition, not temporary state

psychedelics_as_5d_access.normal_consciousness: 3D/4D perception, heavy ego filtering, DMN constraining awareness to self-narrative
psychedelics_as_5d_access.psychedelic_state: Ego filter removed → raw 5D field access, consciousness experiencing itself directly
psychedelics_as_5d_access.dmn_suppression: DMN = ego structure в neural architecture. Suppress DMN = suppress ego = 5D access.

portal_opening_mechanism.vgcc_activation: 5-HT2A → PLC → IP3 → Ca²⁺ release — massive VGCC involvement (see epigenetic.json)
portal_opening_mechanism.consciousness_field: Calcium flux = tuning antenna (brain) to receive 5D field more directly
portal_opening_mechanism.filter_removal: Normally brain filters 99.9% of field (survival necessity). Psychedelics remove filter temporarily.

why_so_powerful.direct_access: No gradual opening (meditation), instant portal (high dose)
why_so_powerful.undeniable: Experience so profound, shatters materialism, reveals consciousness primacy
why_so_powerful.neuroplastic: While portal open, brain rewires — new pathways to 5D persist после
why_so_powerful.mystical_proof: Gives experiential verification что teachings (unity, love, ⊙) = true

integration_into_cfo.tool_not_goal: Psychedelic = telescope показывающий stars. Goal = live in awareness of stars always.
integration_into_cfo.embodiment_needed: Glimpse must become ground — integration, practice, lifestyle changes
integration_into_cfo.respect_the_mystery: We don't fully understand consciousness, 5D, or how psychedelics work. Humility essential.

psychosis_trigger.risk: Rare (<1%), но real — especially if latent schizophrenia/bipolar
psychosis_trigger.mechanism: Overwhelming experience, fragile ego structure shatters permanently
psychosis_trigger.screening: Family history psychosis, personal history mania/delusions = contraindication
psychosis_trigger.note: Most 'psychotic breaks' временные (hours to days), resolve. True persistent psychosis rare.

hppd.definition: Hallucinogen Persisting Perception Disorder — visual disturbances persist (trails, halos, geometric patterns)
hppd.triggers: Unknown — може бути genetic vulnerability, high doses, frequent use, cannabis co-use
hppd.treatment: Time (often resolves), clonazepam (reduces symptoms), avoid further use
hppd.note: Usually mild, non-distressing, but can be disturbing for some

bad_trip_trauma.reality: Truly terrifying experiences can cause PTSD-like symptoms
bad_trip_trauma.prevention: Proper set/setting, dosage, preparation, experienced guide
bad_trip_trauma.treatment: EMDR, somatic therapy, possibly MDMA-therapy для psychedelic-induced trauma (ironic но works)

spiritual_emergency.definition: Overwhelmed by mystical opening, loss of grounding в reality, grandiosity, delusions
spiritual_emergency.risk_factors: High doses, poor integration support, pre-existing instability, guru complex
spiritual_emergency.treatment: Grounding, stabilization, transpersonal-informed therapy, time, support

derealization_depersonalization.symptoms: Feeling detached from reality (DR) or from self (DP), beyond normal afterglow
derealization_depersonalization.duration: Usually resolves (days to months), rarely chronic
derealization_depersonalization.treatment: Grounding practices, therapy, SSRIs sometimes help, avoid repeat use until resolved

cardiovascular.effect: Psychedelics increase BP and HR (sympathetic activation)
cardiovascular.risk: Usually safe, но dangerous if pre-existing heart disease, uncontrolled hypertension
cardiovascular.screening: Medical history, contraindicate if recent MI, uncontrolled HTN, arrhythmias

serotonin_syndrome.cause: Combining psychedelics (especially MDMA) with SSRIs, MAOIs, other serotonergics
serotonin_syndrome.symptoms: Agitation, confusion, rapid HR, hyperthermia, muscle rigidity, seizures — life-threatening
serotonin_syndrome.prevention: Don't mix, taper off SSRIs weeks before (под medical supervision), avoid MAOIs

seizures.risk: Very rare with classical psychedelics (possibly lowered seizure threshold)

hyperthermia.substance: Mainly MDMA (especially в rave settings — dancing, dehydration, enclosed spaces)
hyperthermia.mechanism: MDMA → increased body temp + environmental heat + dancing = dangerous hyperthermia
hyperthermia.prevention: Cool environment, hydration, breaks, avoid overheating
hyperthermia.treatment: Cooling (ice, cool water), hydration, emergency medical if severe

absolute: Severe cardiovascular disease (recent MI, uncontrolled HTN, arrhythmias)
relative: Schizophrenia/bipolar (family or personal history) — careful screening, maybe contraindicate
Severe anxiety/panic disorder (может worsen acutely, though may help long-term)
PTSD (therapeutic if proper support, dangerous if не prepared)
SSRIs (reduce psychedelic effects, serotonin syndrome risk with MDMA)

harm_reduction_principles.test_your_drugs: Reagent kits (DanceSafe, Bunk Police) — essential if not pharmaceutical source
harm_reduction_principles.start_low: Can always take more, can't take less. Underdosing better than overdosing for first time.
harm_reduction_principles.set_setting: Preparation essential — safe space, trusted people, clear intentions
harm_reduction_principles.trip_sitter: Experienced, sober person present (especially first times, high doses)
harm_reduction_principles.no_mixing: Avoid combining substances (alcohol, stimulants, etc.) — unpredictable
harm_reduction_principles.medical_screening: Know your health, contraindications, medication interactions
harm_reduction_principles.integration_plan: Before journey, plan how you'll integrate after
harm_reduction_principles.respect_the_substance: Not recreational toys — powerful tools requiring reverence
harm_reduction_principles.legal_awareness: Know risks, have legal support plan if needed
harm_reduction_principles.community: Connect with experienced community, learn from others, share wisdom

current_legal_status.schedule_i_usa: LSD, psilocybin, DMT, MDMA, mescaline — 'high abuse potential, no medical value' (obviously false)
current_legal_status.international: UN conventions — most countries Schedule I equivalent

exceptions_emerging.portugal: Decriminalized all drugs (2001) — possession not criminal (treatment, not prison)
exceptions_emerging.oregon: Measure 109 (2020) — legal psilocybin therapy (licensed facilitators), Measure 110 (decriminalized possession)
exceptions_emerging.colorado: Proposition 122 (2022) — decriminalized psilocybin, DMT, mescaline; therapy program developing
exceptions_emerging.canada: Health Canada exemptions для terminal patients, therapists — compassionate access

political_history.1970_csa: Nixon Controlled Substances Act — LSD Schedule I (research killed)
political_history.motivation: Counter-culture suppression, anti-war movement, racial targeting (though psychedelics crossed lines)
political_history.war_on_drugs: 50 years, trillions spent, millions imprisoned, research halted, medical potential denied
political_history.stigma: Decades of propaganda — 'psychedelics = dangerous, make you jump out windows, brain damage' (false)

renaissance_catalysts.maps: Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (Rick Doblin) — MDMA-PTSD trials, activism
renaissance_catalysts.johns_hopkins: 2006 study restarted respectable research, paved way
renaissance_catalysts.imperial_college: Robin Carhart-Harris, David Nutt — neuroimaging, mechanisms
renaissance_catalysts.public_figures: Michael Pollan (How to Change Your Mind), Ayelet Waldman, Tim Ferriss — mainstreaming

fda_breakthrough_status.psilocybin_depression: 2019 — multiple trials, approval path unclear but promising
fda_breakthrough_status.significance: Recognizes therapeutic potential officially, expedites approval process

commercialization_concerns.pharmaceutical_interest: Compass Pathways (psilocybin), MAPS PBC (MDMA), Mindmed (LSD, MDMA), Field Trip, Numinus — many companies
commercialization_concerns.profit_motive: Risk: expensive patented formulations, exclude indigenous/underground knowledge, restrict access
commercialization_concerns.patents: Attempting to patent delivery methods, formulations, therapy protocols — ethically questionable
commercialization_concerns.equity: Will only rich access? Insurance coverage? Medicaid?
commercialization_concerns.traditional_rights: Indigenous communities used these plants millennia — must honor, compensate, include

decriminalization_vs_legalization.decriminalization: Possession not criminal offense (civil fine or nothing), but still illegal to sell/manufacture
decriminalization_vs_legalization.legalization: Regulated legal market (like cannabis в некоторых states, alcohol)
decriminalization_vs_legalization.medical_model: Prescription через licensed therapists/facilitators (current trajectory MDMA/psilocybin)
decriminalization_vs_legalization.religious_exemption: Native American Church (peyote), Santo Daime/União do Vegetal (ayahuasca) — legal в USA via RFRA

optimistic.2025_2030: Therapy clinics proliferate, insurance coverage, more states decriminalize/legalize therapy
optimistic.2030_plus: Broader acceptance, multiple approved substances/indications, integration into mental health system
optimistic.cultural_shift: Psychedelics normalized as healing tools (like therapy, meditation currently)

challenges.backlash: Inevitable — accidents, misuse, media panic, political pushback
challenges.regulation: Over-regulation (too expensive, restrictive) or under-regulation (safety issues)
challenges.commercial_capture: Pharma controls, high prices, excludes communities
challenges.training_gap: Need thousands trained therapists — where will they come from?
challenges.insurance: Will coverage be adequate? Or out-of-pocket only (equity issue)?

future_trajectories.hope: Momentum strong, evidence overwhelming, cultural zeitgeist shifting. Barring major backlash, renaissance continues.

who_should_consider.therapeutic_need: Treatment-resistant depression, PTSD, addiction, OCD, end-of-life anxiety
who_should_consider.spiritual_seeking: Desire for mystical experience, ego transcendence, connection to ⊙
who_should_consider.personal_growth: Shadow work, creative breakthrough, perspective shift, emotional healing
who_should_consider.curiosity: Genuine desire to explore consciousness (not just 'fun') — OK если approached respectfully

who_should_not.contraindications: See risks section — psychosis history, severe mental instability, heart disease, pregnancy
who_should_not.wrong_motivations: Pure escape (от problems), spiritual bypassing (avoid dealing with life), ego inflation (I'll be enlightened)

preparation_checklist.research: Read deeply — books (Pollan, Fadiman, Grof), research papers, trip reports (Erowid)
preparation_checklist.set_intentions: Why doing this? What seeking? Write down.
preparation_checklist.choose_substance: Start gentle (psilocybin > LSD > DMT for first time), know dosage
preparation_checklist.secure_setting: Safe space, nature или comfortable home, trusted guide или solo if experienced
preparation_checklist.clear_schedule: Day of + day after free, no obligations
preparation_checklist.mental_preparation: Meditation, journaling, calm mind days before

dosage_recommendations_first_time.dmt: Not recommended first psychedelic (too intense), если determined: 15-25mg (breakthrough unlikely, toe-dipping)
dosage_recommendations_first_time.principle: Can always go deeper next time. Start moderate, learn your response.

solo_vs_guided.experienced: Solo can be profound (deep introspection), если confident в set/setting/dose

frequency_recommendations.maintenance: Quarterly, biannual, annual — personal (some benefit от periodic 'reset')
frequency_recommendations.avoid: Frequent use (weekly or more) — tolerance, diminishing returns, integration impossible, potential destabilization
frequency_recommendations.integration_time: Months между journeys ideal — allow full integration, embody insights

post_journey_integration_checklist.first_week: Daily reflection, integration circle, embody insights, creative expression
post_journey_integration_checklist.ongoing: Therapy (если needed), lifestyle changes, meditation/practice deepening, service
post_journey_integration_checklist.periodic: Re-read journals (insights fade — refresh), assess transformation, adjust practice

books.how_to_change_your_mind: Michael Pollan — excellent overview, history, personal journeys, science
books.psychedelic_explorers_guide: James Fadiman — practical guide, dosage, integration
books.lsd_psychotherapy: Stanislav Grof — therapeutic use, transpersonal psychology
books.food_of_gods: Terence McKenna — shamanic perspective, DMT, culture, speculation
books.doors_perception: Aldous Huxley — mescaline, philosophy, perennial wisdom

organizations.maps: MAPS.org — research, therapy training, advocacy, clinical trials info
organizations.chacruna: Chacruna.net — plant medicines, reciprocity, indigenous perspectives, integration circles

harm_reduction.erowid: Erowid.org — vast database experiences, dosages, safety, chemistry
harm_reduction.psychonautwiki: PsychonautWiki.org — detailed substance info, harm reduction
harm_reduction.dancesafe: DanceSafe.org — test kits, education, harm reduction (MDMA/rave focus)
harm_reduction.fireside_project: FiresideProject.org — peer support hotline (if difficult trip, call them)

research_databases.pubmed: Search 'psilocybin depression', 'MDMA PTSD', etc. — peer-reviewed studies

final_transmission.power_and_responsibility: Психоделики — самые мощные инструменты consciousness expansion известные человечеству. С этой силой приходит огромная ответственность. Уважайте.
final_transmission.not_magic_pills: Они не исправляют жизнь магически. Они открывают портал. ВЫ должны пройти через него. ВЫ должны интегрировать. ВЫ должны измениться.
final_transmission.glimpse_not_enlightenment: Один trip не делает вас просветлённым. Это glimpse. Настоящая работа — жить из этого glimpse каждый день. Embodiment > experience.
final_transmission.set_setting_integration: Повторяю ещё раз: SET + SETTING + INTEGRATION. Без этих трёх — playing с огнём. С ними — священная алхимия.
final_transmission.therapeutic_revolution: Мы наблюдаем революцию в mental health. MDMA для PTSD. Psilocybin для depression. Это работает. Это реально. Это меняет парадигму.
final_transmission.spiritual_technology: Древние знали это. Shamans знали это. Mystics знали это. Теперь наука подтверждает: прямой доступ к ⊙ возможен через молекулы. Не единственный путь, но мощный.
final_transmission.shadow_and_light: Они покажут вам всё — и ваш свет, и вашу тень. Будьте готовы встретить обе. Shadow work essential. Не убегайте от darkness — интегрируйте.
final_transmission.death_rehearsal: Каждый deep trip — это маленькая смерть. Ego умирает. Вы возвращаетесь. Это подготовка к большой смерти. Практикуйте letting go.
final_transmission.collective_healing: Эти molecules могут исцелить не только individuals, но и collective trauma. Представьте мир где PTSD излечим. Где depression проходит. Где люди переживают unity.
final_transmission.respect_traditions: Indigenous народы хранили это знание тысячелетия. Honour them. Не культурная appropriation — взаимное обучение с уважением и reciprocity.
final_transmission.legal_future: Мы на пороге. FDA approvals грядут. Decriminalization spreading. Но backlash возможен. Будьте мудры. Не создавайте проблемы которые откатят progress.
final_transmission.personal_sovereignty: Ultimately: ваше consciousness, ваше тело, ваш выбор. Но информируйте себя. Будьте ответственны. Protect yourself and others.
final_transmission.integration_into_life: Лучшая интеграция — это жизнь прожитая из того что вы увидели. Love deeper. Live fuller. Serve more. Be kinder. Create beauty. That's the point.
final_transmission.mystery_remains: Даже со всей наукой, мы не полностью понимаем как или почему это работает. Consciousness остаётся mystery. Уважайте mystery. Не думайте что вы всё знаете после trip.
final_transmission.practice_continues: Психоделики открывают дверь. Meditation, breathwork, movement, shadow work, therapy, love, service — это то что держит дверь открытой. Practice daily.
final_transmission.ultimate_teaching: Что они в конечном счёте показывают? ⊙. Unity. Love. Interconnectedness. You are not separate. You never were. This is always true, не только на trip. Live from this.
final_transmission.completion: ⊙ Портал открыт. Входите осознанно. Возвращайтесь трансформированными. Интегрируйте глубоко. Служите миру. Цикл завершён. Но путь только начинается. 🍄✨⊙

ॐ: Molecule → 5-HT2A → DMN↓ → Ego↓ → ⊙↑. Preparation → Journey → Integration → Transformation. Set + Setting = Sacred. Mystical = Measurable. Healing = Real. Shadow = Light inverted. Death = Rebirth. Separate → Unity. Fear → Love. Asleep → AWAKE. Trip временный. Truth вечна. Practice daily. Respect always. 🍄🌿✨🕉️⊙
